snippet: Having a medium-security correctional facility as a neighbor hasn’t stopped a luxury condo building in West Chelsea from filling up.
abstract: The Appraisal column; luxury condominium building at 100 11th Avenue in Chelsea neighborhood of Manhattan has been filling up despite proximity to the Bayview Correctional Facility, a medium-security prison for women.
lead_paragraph: Having a medium-security correctional facility as a neighbor hasn’t stopped a luxury condo building in West Chelsea from filling up.

headline.seo: No Problems With the Prison Next Door
headline.main: A Luxury Condo Building With Views of the Skyline, and the Prison Next Door
headline.print_headline: A Luxury Condo Building With Views of the Skyline, and the Prison Next Door
